title: [Neuroscience] Researchers finds that the central amygdala is the "hub‚Äù to generate fear responses and it contains neuronal microcircuits that regulate the suppression of fear responses

[Health] A study in Korea finds long working hours may be negatively associated with fertility: "Of 5,909 Korean female workers, the crude and adjusted odds ratios (95% confidence intervals [CI]) of infertility for working long hours were 1.295 (0.948-1.737) and 1.303 (0.921-1.809), respectively."
